dcterms:description: A dataset containing posts from the PTT bulletin board system, specifically focusing on discussions related to music and singers. The dataset was preprocessed to remove specific formatting, special symbols, and URLs, and was annotated for sentiment classification regarding the opinion targets.
dcterms:title: PTT Dataset

dcterms:description: An aspect-based dataset used for sentiment classification, containing statistics on sentiment categories and distinct targets.
dcterms:title: Aspect-Based Dataset
